author: The Associated Press
title: Trump warns 'toughest' days of pandemic still lie ahead for U.S.
description: U.S. President Donald Trump said Saturday that the United States was heading into what could be its "toughest" weeks as coronavirus cases swell nationwide, and he warned states not to inflate their needs for critical medical equipment.
content:
President Donald Trump said Saturday that the United States was heading into what could be its "toughest" weeks as coronavirus cases swell nationwide, and he warned states not to inflate their needs for critical medical equipment.
